metadata.dc:author: Coelho, F R
Abrao, F S
Breitbarg, R C
metadata.dc:description: Three cases of primary adenocarcinoma of the Fallopian tube have been treated at the Gynecology Department of Hospital A. C. Camargo, Fundación A. Prudente, São Paulo, between 1972-1987. The diagnosis was only possible at surgery. The poor prognosis was due to the advanced stage of the disease. In view of its rarity further studies are necessary for a better diagnostic and therapeutic approach.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma primario de la trompa de falopio. Relato de tres casos clínicos.
[Primary carcinoma of the fallopian tube. A report of 3 clinical cases].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista chilena de obstetricia y ginecologia
